io.github.izdwuut.yarl.model.components.world

Class DungeonComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.izdwuut.yarl.model.components.world.DungeonComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.ashley.core.Component

    public class DungeonComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.ashley.core.Component
    An ASCII representation of a dungeon. It also stores floors.
    Since:
    2017-12-05
    Author:
    Bartosz "izdwuut" Konikiewicz

    • Constructor Detail

      • DungeonComponent

        public DungeonComponent(char[][] dungeon)
        Assigns passed two-dimensional array to a corresponding field. The array is an ASCII representation of a dungeon. It is used to create a GreasedRegion of cells that are floors.
        Parameters:
        dungeon - a two-dimensional array of ASCII characters representing a dungeon

    • Method Detail

      • getDungeon

        public char[][] getDungeon()
        Gets a Dungeon.
        Returns:
        a dungeon as a two-dimensional array of ASCII characters

      • setDungeon

        public void setDungeon(char[][] dungeon)
        Sets a Dungeon.
        Parameters:
        dungeon - a dungeon as a two-dimensional array of ASCII characters

      • getFloors

        public squidpony.squidmath.GreasedRegion getFloors()
        Gets cells that are floors.
        Returns:
        a GreasedRegion of cells that are floors
